scripts.build: npm run css && npm run html && npm run mandoc
scripts.html: awk -v body_file=index-body.html -f build.awk template.html > index.html && awk -v body_file=fast-body.html -f build.awk template.html > fast.html && awk -v body_file=interface-body.html -f build.awk template.html > interface.html && awk -v body_file=resilient-body.html -f build.awk template.html > resilient.html
scripts.mandoc: git show master:man/getargv.1 | mandoc -T html -O style=mandoc.css > man.html && /usr/bin/curl -sSL https://mandoc.bsd.lv/snapshots/mandoc.tar.gz | /usr/bin/tar -x --strip-components=1 --include='*mandoc.css' --file -
